name: Lemonoids Invasion
description:
Instructions

WASD to move up down left and right, click to shoot towards your mouse pointer, press space when at fifty points or higher to trigger a super in a radius shown when you hit fifty points or higher (This will take fifty points). To upgrade click the upgrade buttons when you have 5 or more points to spend 5 points on the upgrade.

Notes and Credits

Credits to Grifftpatch for original scratch tutorial.
